inbound_message_text:

As I say, very much just getting started, but always happy to connect with new folk!

I see future incidents due to CIOs who rushed gen al deployments without understanding security and many if those deployments are now agentic

draft_text:
Fair enough, Alfred ‚Äî no buzzwords.

You set up SAM with your target audience (job titles, industries, etc.). It then comments on relevant LinkedIn posts to build visibility, sends personalized connection requests and follow-ups, and drafts replies for you to approve before anything goes out. You stay in control, it just handles the repetitive bits.

Given PostPilot AI is in the AI space too, you probably get how time-consuming manual outreach is when you're also building product.

Want me to send the trial link so you can poke around yourself?

Since you're fundraising and hunting for B2B clients, SAM could run prospecting in the background while you focus on closes ‚Äî basically an SDR for $99/month.
